description:
Jon Bon Jovi (2020) talks to Justin about how he adjusted to fame during the early days of his career, his experience releasing a new record during the pandemic, and Jon tells Justin about the Jon Bon Jovi Soul Foundation, an organization aimed at tackling issues related to food insecurity and homelessness.
